title: Give Me the Faith Which Can Remove

lyrics.text:
I would the precious time redeem, and longer live for this alone, to spend and to be spent for them
who have not yet my Savior known; fully on these my mission prove, and only breathe, to breathe thy love.

Enlarge, inflame, and fill my heart with boundless charity divine, so shall I all my strength exert,
and love them with a zeal like thine, and lead them to thy open side, the sheep for whom the Shepherd died.

author: Charles Wesley (1749)
